thread.title: Karen Decker
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Karen Decker

author: Karen Decker
title: Karen Decker
text: I called frantically needing the school bus stress relievers quickly, figuring that I probably wouldn't be able to have them in time for my event. However, Paul was extremely helpful and fast! I had everything ordered and artwork worked up within a couple of hours and they were already set for production! He promised a date that I would have the buses here and I actually received them two days earlier! They were great quality and everyone loved them! Thank you so much, especially Paul, for your great, friendly, fast and quality service! I would recommend anyone to you!!
